h1-description: CryptoComet allows you to centralize your cryptocurrency wallets in a single application.

section-1.label: What is CryptoComet?
section-1.title: How it works
section-1.description: Our solution is the centralization of your cryptocurrency wallets. The goal is to provide an overview of the evolution of your balance.
section-1.title-2: One account for several exchange platforms.
section-1.description-2: Nous supportons les plateformes les plus populaires telles que Binance, FTX, Coinbase pro, Bybit, Gate.io et Phemex.
section-1.li-1: We support the most popular platforms such as Binance, FTX, Coinbase pro, Bybit, Gate.io and Phemex.
section-1.li-2: Once your wallet is synchronized, you can access your balance, its evolution and your cryptocurrencies.
section-1.li-3: Add all your portfolios so you can access your total balance at a glance from your portfolio.

section-2.label: CryptoComet Features
section-2.title: Features
section-2.description: We provide you with all its features so that you can manage your cryptocurrencies in the easiest and clearest way possible.

1.title: Dashboard
1.description: Always have quick access to your portfolio balance, its evolution graph of the last 24 hours, the crypto-currencies with the best market capitalization as well as the "Fear & Greed" index of Bitcoin and Etherum.

2.title: Wallet
2.description: You can view each portfolio independently of the others, add as many portfolios as you like to your portfolio to calculate your actual total balance.

3.title: Portfolio
3.description: It will give you an overview of the evolution, balance and cryptocurrencies of your wallets.

4.title: Alerts
4.description: Alerts are there to make your life easier. Set up your price alerts on the crypto-currencies of your choice to receive email or push notifications (mobile) when the price reaches or drops to a certain amount.

5.title: Fee comparator
5.description: Use our fee comparator to find out on which exchange platform it is more advantageous to buy or sell a given cryptocurrency.

6.title: Web / Mobile
6.description: Access your portfolio anywhere, anytime. Our application is accessible from the web browser as well as from our mobile application.

exchanges.label: Supported exchange platforms
exchanges.title: Manage all your cryptocurrency wallets.
exchanges.description: CryptoComet allows you to add up to 6 trading platforms with no account limit.

apps.label: Our apps
apps.title: Access your Portfolio anywhere
apps.description: Take advantage of CryptoComet's two platforms, its web application and its mobile application.

tabs-1.title: Web application
tabs-1.description: Access all CryptoComet features from the web application.
tabs-1.li-1: Keep your wallets and portfolio in view.
tabs-1.li-2: Manage your crypto alerts and take advantage of the fee comparator for your purchases and sales.

tabs-2.title: Mobile application
tabs-2.description: The mobile application is a condensed version of the web application, allowing you to access your Portfolio quickly.
tabs-2.li-1: Direct access to your portfolio and cryptocurrencies.
tabs-2.li-2: Alert management with push notification reception.
